content.rendered:
Ludo King : Play Online Ludo Game

Ludo King is Most popular Ludo game on the world. You can Play Ludo King in online multiplayer mode. 

Ludo King Browser Game for Desktop

Ludo King is an Indian free-to-play mobile game application developed by Indian studio Gametion Technologies Pvt Ltd, based in Navi Mumbai, India.

Gametion is owned by Vikash Jaiswal. It is developed on the Unity game engine and is available on Android, iOS, Kindle, Windows Phone and Microsoft Windows platforms. The game is a modernization of the board game, Ludo, which in turn is based on the ancient Indian game of Pachisi.

Ludo Game : Multiplayer Board Game.

Before Ludo King, Gametion primarily focused on developing browser games for desktop users. In 2013, the company shifted focus to mobile gaming. It published several games, including Snakes and Ladders and Baby’s Big Adventure, but these were all average. The company rose to prominence with the release of Ludo King.

Ludo Game

ludo board game is a strategy board game for two to four players, in which the players race their four tokens from start to finish according to the rolls of a single die. Like other cross and circle games, Ludo is derived from the Indian game Pachisi.
The game and its variations are popular in many countries and under various names.

Ludo Tricks & Tips that will make you invincible at the game!

The increasing popularity of ludo has led to the game being available at our fingertips, where we can play conveniently at any hour and against random players. When you play the traditional board game against the same players, you tend to identify their traits and form a strategy to win against them, and vice versa.
But if you play online, you are mostly competing against different players each time. How would you devise your strategy without knowing the player personally? This is where you can use the tips and tricks to become invincible in Ludo.

Here are essential ludo tips and tricks you can implement in the next game you play and come out as a winner.

Open all the coin pieces

One of the first ludo tricks towards your winning strategy is to get all your coins out of the home base at the earliest.

Spread your coins on the board

If you want a strategic advantage in a ludo match, you should focus on spreading your coins across the board.

Adopt an attacking strategy

Attacking opponents is the most thrilling part of playing ludo, even when you put your coins at risk.

Patience is the key

Being patient is one of the key ludo tips in winning the game. For instance, if your coins are on the board’s star-shaped zones, your opponents cannot kill your coins in those zones.

Block your opponent

Distracting your opponent is a trick of getting your coin safely to enter the home. When any of your coins are nearing your home, your opponents will always eye that piece and aim to capture it.

Play Ludo Online

Play Ludo King Online for Free on PC & Mobile.

Ludo King is the only unblocked games in which you can play with your family members or friends living in another city or state. Well. Undoubtedly, such a game increases bonding and strengthens the relationship. Ludo is a board game played by 4 people. Long back, Ludo was considered as an indoor game. But, with the takeover of technology, now you can play Ludo with anyone staying miles apart. You just need to download the application on your Android or iOS device.

When it comes to board games in the gaming application world, everyone has heard of Ludo King. Ludo King Game App was launched by Gametion Technologies Pvt. Ltd. As of now, Ludo Game App has 100M+ downloads which makes it one of the famous or popular Ludo Game App. The app has over 4M+ reviews wherein 80% of the reviews are positive.

Ludo STAR

Ludo STAR is the amazing game that you can play with your friends & family. The game has four colors: red, blue, green and yellow. Are your friends kings of Ludo? Bring them all to the classic game played by the Indian emperors.

Can I play Ludo Star on PC?

Ludo Stars is a game with two to four players. The goal is to make the tour of the circuit to your 4 pieces and to bring them back home before the other players. You can play against other players or against the computer.

Ludo All Star

Ludo All Star is a Parcheesi game where you can play with two to four players on the same board. All of this in a fun online game mode where you face off against players from all over the world to be the first to get all of the pawns on the last space.

How do you play Ludo All Star game?

Controls in Ludo All Star are quite simple—just throw the dice to start your turn. All you have to do is click on the pawn that you want to move when it’s your turn. However, you do need to roll a six to get started. You can also even automate gameplay if you want to just sit back and watch the game unfold.

Ludo Classic

Ludo Classic is playable online as an HTML5 game, therefore no download is necessary.

Ludo Club – Fun Dice Game

Ludo Club is the best board game to play with friends! This is the free online multiplayer version of the epic hit board game Ludo.

Ludo Movie

Ludo is a 2020 Indian Hindi-language black comedy crime film written and directed by Anurag Basu.

It is produced by Bhushan Kumar, Divya Khosla Kumar, Krishan Kumar, Anurag Basu, Tani Basu and Deepshika Bose under the banners of T-Series, Anurag Basu Productions and Ishana Movies. It stars an ensemble cast of Abhishek Bachchan, Aditya Roy Kapur, Rajkummar Rao, Sanya Malhotra, Pearle Maaney, Pankaj Tripathi, Fatima Sana Shaikh, Rohit Suresh Saraf, Shalini Vatsa, and Inayat Varma.
